content.text:
[@Kaotisk Hund](@mRfbxGwMTH1vU29/WPhdBxcyVvSwgV4MlrVjyRt1V40=.ed25519) 

Hey, sorry that's giving you some trouble. It sounds to me like you *only* want to connect to pubs that you're manually followed, is that correct? The current implementation peers with every pub that it can, so when your friends connect to a pub then your client adds those details to a file (`~/.ssb/gossip.json`) and peers with them often to get messages from people you follow.
